TextLibrary.Text: An Arboleth surprises you while you are searching.
You have failed to defeat the Arboleth. You will not be able to complete your search until it is dealt with.
You have defeated the Arboleth, but there is no sign of the Dragon here.
Elistara hopes that you soon have the time to search further.
You must travel to the Bloodstone and search for the Dragon.
You must return to Elistara and tell her you could not find the Dragon.
